main event: A civilian dispatcher observed a pale luminous disc-shaped object at Newark Air Force Base on November 8, 1948.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 5,000 to 6,000 feet., The sighting lasted for one second or less., The object appeared to have no sound., It traveled in an arc from the north northwest to the south southeast., The object was described as being about one third the brightness of the moon and flat with little or no depth.
witness description: Civilian dispatcher and former Air Force pilot, highly intelligent and dependable.
